scripts.build:svgs-inherit: npm run build:extension-icons && npm run build:services-icons-old && npm run build:interface-icons-old && npm run compile:interface-icons-product && npm run compile:service-icons
scripts.build:extension-icons: rimraf src/components/extension-icons && svgr -d src/components/extension-icons svgs/inherit/extension --config-file templates/.svgrrc.js
scripts.build:services-icons-old: rimraf src/components/services-icons && svgr -d src/components/services-icons-old svgs/inherit/services-old --config-file templates/.svgrrc.js
scripts.build:interface-icons-old: rimraf src/components/interface-icons-old && svgr -d src/components/interface-icons-old svgs/inherit/interface-old --config-file templates/.svgrrc.js
scripts.compile:interface-icons-product: npm run fix:interface-icons-product && npm run build:interface-icons-product
scripts.build:interface-icons-product: rimraf src/components/interface-icons-product && svgr -d src/components/interface-icons-product svgs-fixed/interface-icons-product --config-file templates/.svgrrc-product.js
scripts.compile:service-icons: npm run fix:service-icons && npm run build:service-icons
scripts.build:service-icons: rimraf src/components/service-icons && svgr -d src/components/service-icons svgs-fixed/service-icons --config-file templates/.svgrrc-product.js
scripts.build:svgs-color: npm run build:logo-icons && npm run build:flag-icons
scripts.build:flag-icons: rimraf src/components/flag-icons && svgr --config-file templates/.svgrrc-color.js -d src/components/flag-icons svgs/color/flags
scripts.build:logo-icons: npm run prepare:logo-icons && npm run compile:logo-icons && npm run index:logo-icons
scripts.compile:logo-icons: rimraf src/components/logo-icons && svgr -d src/components/logo-icons svgs-fixed/logo-icons --config-file templates/.svgrrc-adaptive.js
scripts.build:sprite-icons: npm run validate:icons && npm run fix:icons && npm run create-sprite
